tweets.text: Great presentation and discussion session today on #NaturalCapital at a local scale. Huge thanks to @ColmBowe and his team from @LJMU for taking the time to demonstrate the huge potential for future #Catchment #Planning and #Delivery to @EnvAgencyNW and key #Partners 😊👍🏼

Join me next week as I host the next #FloodandCoast digital session on 9 Dec discussing the #ClimateEmergency and featuring speakers @CvNieuwenhuizen, @SaleemulHuq, @DeniseBower1310 and @annietrev. Book tickets here: https://t.co/diXMjPkfo5. @EnvAgency https://t.co/mmB6dDXCmf

urls.title: Programme & Registration | Flood & Coast
urls.description: Telford International Centre, UK The 2021 Flood and Coast conference and expo will take place on Hopin, a virtual event platform designed to feel like an in-person event. Each day will be fully packed with interactive sessions, live exhibition booths and networking opportunities, with the audience addressing some of the most important issues in FCERM. Delegates will interact with speakers through the live Q & A sessions, meet with exhibitors in our live expo hall, and connect with new people through

tweets.text:
I've often ask the question "And the @EnvAgency does what exactly?"

Transpires we now have an answer. It's not a lot.

"The Environment Agency attended just 292 water pollution incidents, down from 1,726 during the same period in 2019". @bilgribs 

https://t.co/Hbcmxyl5pI

urls.title: Environment Agency slashes number of water pollution incident visits
urls.description: Huge drop in number of visits during Covid crisis raises concerns polluters are breaking laws with impunity

tweets.text:
The first beaver dam in over 400 years appeared on Exmoor after beavers were released into the wild in January.

These rodents can play an important role in engineering the landscape and helping to restore streams and reduce #flooding.

Learn more: https://t.co/h7VascPfWg

urls.title: Beavers build first Exmoor dam in 400 years
urls.description: The National Trust says the dam in Somerset "might look modest, but it is incredibly special".

tweets.text: @swaledalebirds_ @WoodlandTrust @theriverstrust @ProfJGrey @yorkshire_dales @EnvAgencyYNE @Addingham_Group @TCVtweets @NEYorksNLincs Yes it’s a cross contour hedge connecting two small woods!

@MarcGra95162166 Hi Marc. Work during this phase of the scheme has included raising and extending flood walls and improving the flow of water through Botcherby Bridge to allow a greater volume of water to pass through during a flood.

@TamFinkelstein And so much more besides, @TamFinkelstein... Smartphone as river/flood flow measurement device...? Yep, we have that now! Huge potential for @EnvAgency staff responding to flood incidents + citizen science etc @flowonthegoltd @UK_CEH https://t.co/RWULU3samu

Day 2 of reducing plastic at Christmas: avoid stockings with wrapped treats and throwaway items ♻️ An extra 30% of rubbish is produced and discarded throughout the festive period! 🎄 @EnvAgency https://t.co/jhomgrgP1I

tweets.text: Thanks to the @EnvAgency and @CambsCC (Lead local flood authority) for supporting sustainable drainage systems and groundwater recharge at Northstowe Phase 1. Thanks to your support, the request by L&Q Estates to remove SuDS requirement has been withdrawn. https://t.co/P7ScTyEN4H

Object #49 #Defragroupin100objects: smart phone. Keeping our people safe, connected and informed, whether at home, in the office or out in the field. Supporting work-life balance, helping us work smarter and keeping us plugged in to Defra group apps https://t.co/UUE4epdMDI

📢Brilliant news to share from #StaffsSUNRISE today! @PaulNGaskell from @WildTroutTrust visited our new river channels at #VictoriaGround & @StaffsUni & found several brown trout 'nests' (redds) - meaning they're using them for spawning already!   
@EnvAgencyMids @SoTCityCouncil https://t.co/CIiefX7mqC

Our officers worked with Durham Constabulary last week to detain three suspected poachers. 

The men were using a 1.5m gaff to illegally spear salmon and trout spawning in shallow waters. Read more, including how to report poaching: https://t.co/UhZgPenmlW https://t.co/3MXLnVFDFx

The @EnvAgency's prestigious #FCExcellenceAwards recognise and celebrate work that manages flood and coastal risk, builds local flood resilience and takes action on climate change.

tweets.text: @theadamrp The @EnvAgency has made this video with @stewart_mounsey showing how they hope the flood defences in the Warwick Road area of Carlisle will protect more than 1,200 homes https://t.co/4SxRes22AM

Over 500 trees & shrubs have been planted at Brearley Fields as part of #MytholmroydFAS. 

For every tree removed to construct the new flood defences - 2 new ones are planted nearby. #nationaltreeplantingweek #NFM
